thread.title: New Zealand's High Commissioner on potential new flag
thread.title_full: New Zealand's High Commissioner on potential new flag - BBC News

author: BBC
title: New Zealand's High Commissioner on potential new flag
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device New Zealand's High Commissioner on potential new flag 13 October 2015 Last updated at 15:01 BST
New Zealand High Commissioner Sir Lockwood Smith speaks to Jo Coburn about upcoming votes on a potential new flag that could replace the current design, which features a Union Jack.
Voters will face two referendums, the first to choose a new design.
The second will see a straight choice between the winning design from the first round against the current flag.
Read more Romania village of Clinceni claims largest flag record
